tab1.text1:
Welcome to <RichColor Color="1,0.2,0.6,1">Matriark</> - a <RichColor Color="1,0.95,0.6,1">Community of Mature Survivors</>.

This is a stable, long-term 8 map cluster with crossplay-safe mods and plugins that enhance gameplay for adult lives.

The founder, <RichColor Color="1,0.2,0.6,1">JustSimply_JJ</>, has hosted Ark maps since 2021 and self-hosts Matriark solo â€” keeping the servers <RichColor Color="0.3,1,0.3,1">maintained, updated, and running smoothly</>.

Many of the players youâ€™ll meet here have been part of this Community for a long time.

<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">On Matriark you can explore, build, and survive with like-minded adults who value respect, consideration, and zero toxicity.</>
<RichColor Color="1,0.3,0.7,1">We hope you enjoy your time with us.</>
<RichColor Color="0.5,0.5,0.5,1">â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">HAPPY ARKING!</>

tab2.text1:
ğŸ‘‰ Respect the Community, donâ€™t be an ass. On Matriark Kindness and consideration are key at all times.
<RichColor Color="0.5,0.5,0.5,1">â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€</>

1. Be a mature, respectful adult, no exceptions.
No toxicity, harassment, or drama in chat, Discord, or anywhere on the Cluster.

2. No inappropriate names and no "human" characters in game.
Applies to any language, final call is JJs.

3. No replacements or handouts.
Lost tames or items from normal gameplay or Wildcard bugs will not be replaced.

4. No repeated complaints.
Cluster chat is not tech support for Wildcard or Mod issues.

5. Be mindful where you build.
Do not build near others or close to public structures.
ğŸ¡ Base limits per map:
â€¢ A main base
â€¢ An outpost, public trap, or treehouse
â€¢ A water pen for raising and storing water tames

6. Breeding & wandering limits.
Do not leave tames on breed or wander.
Max 2 snails + 2 dung beetles (neutered).

7. No blocking.
Do not block major resources, explorer notes, artifact caves, or public-use areas.

8. Max 30 tames out while offline.
No tames on neutral, aggressive, or flee â€” no mess.

9. Turrets.
â€¢ Set to Wilds Only
â€¢ Medium or Low range
â€¢ Turret damage Ã—50
â€¢ ORP active

10. Structure pickup is ON.
Clean up after yourself. No spamming.

11. Cloning chambers.
Max 1 per tribe, per map.

12. Choose Tribe members wisely.
Ongoing rule-breaks by members may result in your whole Tribe being wiped & banned.

13. Ocean Platform Limit.
Max of 4 large squares, or any mix of others equal to that size.
<RichColor Color="0.5,0.5,0.5,1">â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€</>
